articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Nigerian police on heightened alert after U.S. killing of Iranian commander
articles.description: Nigerian police have been placed on a heightened state of alert after the U.S. killing of a top Iranian military commander in Iraq sparked fears of public disturbances in the West African country, the police said on Sunday.
articles.content:
ABUJA (Reuters) - Nigerian police have been placed on a heightened state of alert after the U.S. killing of a top Iranian military commander in Iraq sparked fears of public disturbances in the West African country, the police said on Sunday.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Venezuela's Maduro says congress has elected new leadership
articles.description: Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro on Sunday said the country's congress had elected new leadership, hours after the ruling Socialist Party installed a new chief of congress as troops blocked opposition leader Juan Guaido from entering parliament.
articles.content: CARACAS (Reuters) - Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro on Sunday said the country’s congress had elected new leadership, hours after the ruling Socialist Party installed a new chief of congress as troops blocked opposition leader Juan Guaido from entering pa… [+40 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Coalition must continue fight against Islamic State in Iraq: France's Le Drian
articles.description: French Foreign Minister Jean-Yves Le Drian said on Sunday that he had spoken by phone with Iraq's prime minister, and stressed the importance of allowing the international coalition to fight against Islamic State militants in Iraq and Syria.
articles.content: PARIS (Reuters) - French Foreign Minister Jean-Yves Le Drian said on Sunday that he had spoken by phone with Iraq’s prime minister, and stressed the importance of allowing the international coalition to fight against Islamic State militants in Iraq and Syria.… [+289 chars]

articles.title: Germany seeks crisis meeting of EU foreign ministers
articles.description: German Foreign Minister Heiko Maas called on Sunday for a crisis meeting of his European Union counterparts this week to discuss escalating tension in the Middle East following the killing of a top Iranian military commander in Iraq by the United States.

articles.author: Felice Wu and Yimou Lee
articles.title: Taiwan election is make or break for fleeing Hong Kong protesters
articles.description: A small but growing number of Hong Kong protesters who fled to Taiwan for safety over the past few months fear an opposition victory in the island's election this week will put them in peril and force them to leave.
articles.content:
TAIPEI (Reuters) - A small but growing number of Hong Kong protesters who fled to Taiwan for safety over the past few months fear an opposition victory in the island’s election this week will put them in peril and force them to leave.

articles.author: Ahmed Rasheed
articles.title: Iraqi parliament backs government push to expel foreign troops
articles.description: Iraq's parliament on Sunday backed a recommendation by the prime minister that all foreign troops should be ordered out after the U.S. killing of a top Iranian military commander and an Iraqi militia leader in Baghdad.
articles.content:
BAGHDAD (Reuters) - Iraq’s parliament on Sunday backed a recommendation by the prime minister that all foreign troops should be ordered out after the U.S. killing of a top Iranian military commander and an Iraqi militia leader in Baghdad.

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Amazon is generating lots of free-cash flow, time to get on board - Barron's
articles.description: Amazon.com Inc is generating lots of free cash flow, which it often uses to invest in growing its business, making the e-commerce retailer a good investment, weekly newspaper Barron's said on Jan. 3.
articles.content:
NEW YORK (Reuters) - Amazon.com Inc (AMZN.O) is generating lots of free cash flow, which it often uses to invest in growing its business, making the e-commerce retailer a good investment, weekly newspaper Barron’s said on Jan. 3. 
The company’s shares closed… [+743 chars]

articles.author: Reuters Editorial
articles.title: Iran's missile forces at heightened state of alert: U.S. official
articles.description: The United States has detected a heightened state of alert by Iran's missile forces across the country, a U.S. official told Reuters on Sunday, adding it was unclear whether the higher readiness level was defensive in nature or not.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON (Reuters) - The United States has detected a heightened state of alert by Iran’s missile forces across the country, a U.S. official told Reuters on Sunday, adding it was unclear whether the higher readiness level was defensive in nature or not.
